    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Indicates whether there are more tokens to be returned.
        Returns:
        True if there are more tokens to be returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If an I/O error occurs

      • next

        public Token next()
        Returns the next token.
        Returns:
        The next token
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If there is no more token or if there is an IOException

      • pushBack

        public void pushBack()
        Takes back the token just returned by next(), so that a subsequent call to next() will return the same token again.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
